to report earnings, excluding items, of$ 8.06 a share, on$ 6.05 billion in revenue.`` Q4 marked a terrific end to a stellar year,'' Eric Schmidt said in a statement. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile. These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web. In after-hours trading, shares of Google rose 2.1 percent to$ 639.68, despite having closed Thursday's regular session down 0.8 percent. Shelter's primary group of promoters and DJs was collectively known as`` NASA''( Nocturnal Audio+ Sensory Awakening), who took over the club every Friday night. Its promotional flyers claimed The Shelter to be New York Citys only Non-prejudicial Progressive Underground Dance Club. The dance floor had a notoriously loud 37000 watt sound system designed by David Letterman Soto, a New York based audio specialist in collaboration with Garage-era DJ legend Timmy Regisford . The speaker cabinets were larger than the dancing patrons.
